last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nejra admits to the murder, but Nevena is convinced that she is protecting Adi. After Dino's accident, Nevena decides it's time for a change.

name: I Know Your Soul
overview: A single mother of a teenager in the midst of a divorce, Nevena Murtezic struggles to balance her life between her 17-year-old son, Dino, and a job constantly under pressure from politics and the public.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Prosecutor Nevena Murtazić, a single mother in the process of divorce, investigates the case of the suicide of a teenage boy from the same school as her son Dino.  The case takes on personal urgency when Nevena suspects the school may be hiding abuse that affects other students. Consumed by concern for Dino, who’s also started to skip classes, Nevena is blindsided when the victim’s father accuses Dino of being one of the abusers. Driven by endless motherly love and personal responsibility, Nevena desperately tries to pull together facts under relentless pressure from all sides, trying to fight for the truth in a society where justice is defined by an economic and male-oriented political elite, only supported by a long-term colleague and admirer and a newbie who keeps reporting to her superior behind her back. But the fact-finding that makes Nevena so good at her job ends up pitting her against her son she fears she can no longer trust.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Prosecutor Nevena, a single mother in the process of divorce, investigates the case of the suicide of a teenage boy from the same school as her son Dino. The case takes on personal urgency when Nevena suspects the school may be hiding abuse that affects other students. Consumed by concern for Dino, who’s also started to skip classes, Nevena is blindsided when the victim’s father accuses Dino of being one of the abusers.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The new prosecutor takes on the case. Nevena tries to help her son, but she is torn between what the evidence shows and what her son is telling her.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Nevena and Kemal are assigned to a new case related to an elite prostitution ring. Nevena's relationship with her son remains strained.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: After the high school reunion, Nevena continues to struggle against the system that protects Arman and others like him.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: When the body of the notorious criminal Ziper is been found at a construction site, Nevena is assigned to the case

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Nejra admits to the murder, but Nevena is convinced that she is protecting Adi. After Dino's accident, Nevena decides it's time for a change.

The case takes on personal urgency when Nevena suspects the school may be hiding abuse that affects other students. Consumed by concern for Dino, who’s also started to skip classes, Nevena is blindsided when the victim’s father accuses Dino of being one of the abusers. Driven by endless motherly love and personal responsibility, Nevena desperately tries to pull together facts under relentless pressure from all sides, trying to fight for the truth in a society where justice is defined by an economic and male-oriented political elite, only supported by a long-term colleague and admirer and a newbie who keeps reporting to her superior behind her back. But the fact-finding that makes Nevena so good at her job ends up pitting her against her son she fears she can no longer trust.
